Made with an oversized relaxed fit, this unisex fleece brings endless comfort and style to casual outings and cold weather adventures. Woven overlays on the collar, chest, back yoke, and lower sleeves add an extra layer of durability. Designed in SKIMS classic colorways as part of the limited-edition The North Face x SKIMS Collection.
